actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend section 552 of title 5, United States Code (known as the Freedom o Information Act) to specify those matters which in the interest of the national defense may be withheld from public disclosure by a Federal agency.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Specifies, under the Freedom of Information Act, those matters which in the interest of the national defense may be withheld from public disclosure by a Federal agency.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 552 of title 5, United States Code (known as the Freedom o Information Act) to specify those matters which in the interest of the national defense may be withheld from public disclosure by a Federal agency.
